summary: Acting on impulse, CLAIRE DENNISON, enjoys a brief fling with a sexy stranger (a dead ringer for her husband), only to realize that the object of her desire is a crazed, manipulative, and tenacious psychopath.
cast: Angus Macfadyen|Willa Ford|Robert Moloney|Ron Selmour|Pablo Silveira|Ingrid Torrance|Laura Soltis|Nancy Sivak|Michael J Rogers|Lowela Jotie|Richard Stroh|Peter Kawasaki|Toshi Haraguchi|Taku Kawai|Kathleen Duborg|Liza Huget|Allan Lysell|Lindsay Collins|Marco Soriano|Kevan Ohtsji|Lau Lau Li-Cook|Darren Moore|Stephanie Marois|C. Ernst Harth|Apollonia Vanova|Sarah Penikett|Floyd Faircrest|Fay Salmon|Arman Behramand|Jamie Parsons|Natalie Pagnucco|Geneviee Guard
title: Impulso homicida
